title: Ready 4 Battle Soundtrack Pack
description: Epic Cinematic Orchestral Music Pack: A suite allowing to enhance tension in battles and crisis situations and setting an immersive atmosphere in your game
longDescription:
Ready 4 Battle is a library of 9 different soundtracks suited for action gameplay and cinematic scenes

All tracks provide a very immersive atmosphere but also have fast pace rhythm and synth sections built-in. This music relies heavily on the following Instrumentation:

  • Strings
  • Brass
  • Piano
  • Epic Rhythm Section
  • Synth Bass
  • Atmospheric Pads
  • Atmospheric FX


In addition to the full soundtracks, this music pack contains 3-4 layers per track which are seamlessly loopable.


Tracklist:

  • Artificial (3 Layers)
  • Dark Ambience (4 Layers)
  • Tension Swells (4 Layers)
  • The Game Is On (4 Layers)
  • Cold9 (4 Layers)
  • Mission C (3 Layers)
  • Skyline (4 Layers)
  • Tech Attack (3 Layers)
  • Time Will Heal (4 Layers)


Listen to all the full soundtracks on youtube:

https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL-OisvKqDDASFjai07iLR6GxvZRGF97xx
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  9 Full Soundtracks (not loopable)
  •  3-4 Layers each (loopable)

Number of Audio Wavs: 42

Number of Audio Cues: 42

Sample rate / bit rate: 44100 khz/ 16 bit

Does music loop: Yes


For further questions or custom requests please contact info@soundguybasel.ch
